summary: An ordinance granting permission to W. E. Hagan to improve 24th Avenue North from East Lynn Street to the south line of East Roanoke Street; East Louisa Street and East Miller Street, each from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North, and the north 33 feet of East Lynn Street, from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, at his own cost and expense.
